summary: The module defines reusable configurations and helper utilities for setting up integration test environments in Feast. It includes classes for managing test environments, simulating permission servers, and aggregating universal data source and feature view definitions. Several factory functions construct common data sources, entities, feature views, and test datasets that can be applied across multiple offline and online store backends.
business_intent: Enable consistent and comprehensive integration testing of the Feast feature store by providing a single source of truth for repository configuration, data source creation, feature view definitions, and permission handling across diverse storage platforms.
